DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Trial Gemcitabine Radiation Locally Advanced Unresectable Cancer Pancreas
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase I trial gemcitabine give weekly 30 minute infusion administer concurrently radiation patient locally advance locally recurrent pancreatic carcinoma . Patients treat external beam radiation therapy standard manner . Gemcitabine administer 30 minute infusion begin first day irradiation weekly afterwards total 5 dos . Patients assess clinically acute toxicity grade per RTOG DCT toxicity grade system .
